name: Capture Firefly
description:
This is a project for a university class in game developement.  Enjoy!
Capture the fireflies.
Player character is provided by Mixamo (https://www.mixamo.com/)
Game created in Unreal Engine 4.21.
Educational product offered for free.
Feeedback can be provided here on itch.io or on ourwebsite at http://kidshideaway.net/contact-us

Game mechanics keys:
Move Left: a
Move right: d
Move forward: w
Move back: x
Catch fire fly: r
Competitor Menu: Tab
